mapper.select: select calender.id ,calender.employee_id, calender.count,calender.product_id,calender.datetime, employee.first_name,employee.last_name,product.product_name,product.current_count from calenders calender left join employees employee on employee.id = calender.employee_id left join products product on product.id = calender.product_id order by calender.id

select calender.id ,calender.employee_id, calender.count,calender.product_id,calender.datetime, employee.first_name,employee.last_name,product.product_name,product.current_count from calenders calender left join employees employee on employee.id = calender.employee_id left join products product on product.id = calender.product_id WHERE calender.datetime between #{date} and #{to}
mapper.update: update products set current_count = current_count - #{count} where id = #{product_id}
update calenders set employee_id = #{employee_id},count = #{count},product_id = #{product_id} where id = #{id}
